title: First Mover Americas: BTC Loses $43K as Crypto Prices Slip
description: The latest price moves in bitcoin [BTC] and crypto markets in context for Jan. 31, 2024. First Mover is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter that contextualizes the latest actions in the crypto markets.

title: Ethereum's 'Dencun' Upgrade Goes Live on Second Testnet, With Just One Remaining
description: Next week, on Feb. 7, Dencun will go live on its final Ethereum testnet, Holesky. After that, developers will ink in a date to activate Dencun on the main blockchain.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

The Web3 ecosystem lost $38.9 million due to various security incidents in the first month of 2024. Terraform Labs says its bankruptcy could help it appeal the suit it faces from the SEC. Meanwhile, German authorities seized 50,000 Bitcoin (BTC) as part of an investigation into pirated materials .

Decentralized finance (DeFi) security startup Quantstamp found that various attacks on Web3 projects like smart contract hacks, key compromises and scams, resulted in total losses of $38.9 million in January 2024.

Germany isn’t the only government to seize Bitcoin. According to data from Glassnode, the United States has seized a total of 210,429 BTC connected to various crimes.

Read more

title: Ethereum Classic (ETC) Price Prediction 2024-2030: Will ETC Hit $50 Soon?
